column14: I have been on the search for good curly hair products.  I am trying to move towards more natural products.  My hair stylist recommended this b/c it is vegan/ organic. column6: Best shampoo for my curly course hair
column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2019
column14: I have curly course hair that I blow dry straight and flat iron, so it needs all the moisturizing in the world but also something that will clean my scalp well between shampoos as I can go a while between shampoos. This one does the trick. I’ve used it the past several years and although my stylist has given me samples of other products, I just won’t give up this shampoo or the conditioner. My sister has completely different hair from me, not problem hair as I consider mine to be. Her hair is thick, wavy, and smoother than my hair but I turned her on to this shampoo and conditioner and she’s sold as well. My only complaint is the packaging from the shipper; the bottles are packed loose in a box and get thrown around during shipping. The product itself is glorious, highly recommend the conditioner as well.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2020
column14: I'll start by saying I've used Surface products for years, and the Surface Therapeutic Awaken Shampoo is amazing.  I'm in my early 50s and have had thinning hair since my early 40s.  I've used this product for about 2 years, and my hair is now as thick as it was in my 30s.  My reason for the one-star rating is the packaging.  I opened the plastic white envelope today after it arrived and noticed a considerable amount of shampoo inside the envelope.  I can hold the bottle up to the light and see approx. 25% of it leaked out of the lid during shipping.  There was no plastic/bubble packaging or tape over the lid.  The bottle was just loose inside the envelope.  The price of this item has gone from $59 to $67 in a month.  In my opinion, that's expensive for a 33 oz. bottle, but I'm willing to pay more because it's an excellent product.  However, if customers are paying such a high price, they should receive ALL of the product.  If a simple piece of tape had been put over the lid, I'd have been able to rate this product 5 stars...hands down!
